description:
This course will teach you everything you need to know to get started using Zaxwerks 3D Flag. Create amazing looking Flags, Banners, Curtains, and many other types of 3D cloth that all react to real dynamics like wind and gravity.

Normally when someone wants to create awesome looking 3D cloth they have to spend 2 years of their lives learning extremely hard big 3D programs. This course hates that idea! Instead we want to get you up and going with 3D cloth in 8 short videos that will make your work look professional and make clients want to hire or rehire you.
title: Zaxwerks 3D Flag - The Basics
